page.title: 09Employment in Guildtown Area
page.content:
There are very limited job opportunities in this area. Fewer than 5% of the population work on the land.
In the village itself there work:_ at the school_ 3 Teachers, 2 Cooks and 1 cleaner. at the garage_ 3 Mechanics, etc. at the Inn _ 4 full-time, 2 part- time workers. Other than these 15 people there are the District Nurse and the Sub- Post Mistress.
Unless as above stated, all people seeking employment must travel outwith this area. Most go to Perth, some to Dundee and one to Coupar Angus.
However, it should be stated that all 3 Teachers at the school travel from outwith the immediate area daily.
